short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Watch your favourite shows and movies ad free on vtm go.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension blocks all the ads on the website https://vtm.be/ . Users should install it because the site won't let you see any shows if you're using any other ad blocker.
